mapper.sql: a.id AS "id" , a.parent_id AS "parentId" , a.name AS "name" , a.sort AS "sort" , a.area_id AS "area.id" , a.code AS "code" , a.type AS "type" , a.grade AS "grade" , a.address AS "address" , a.zip_code AS "zipCode" , a.phone AS "phone" , a.fax AS "fax" , a.email AS "email" , a.useable AS "useable" , a.primary_person AS "primaryPerson" , a.deputy_person AS "deputyPerson" , a.create_by AS "createBy.id" , a.create_date AS "createDate" , a.update_by AS "updateBy.id" , a.update_date AS "updateDate" , a.remarks AS "remarks" , a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT level AS "level", connect_by_isleaf AS "leaf",
FROM sys_office a START WITH a.parent_id = #{rootId} CONNECT BY PRIOR a.id = a.parent_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY sort

SELECT
FROM sys_office a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office( id, parent_id, name, sort, area_id, code, type, grade, address, zip_code, phone, fax, email, useable, primary_person, deputy_person, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{area.id}, #{code}, #{type}, #{grade}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{useable}, #{primaryPerson}, #{deputyPerson}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_office SET id=#{id}, parent_id=#{parentId}, name=#{name}, sort=#{sort}, area_id=#{area.id}, code=#{code}, type=#{type}, grade=#{grade}, address=#{address}, zip_code=#{zipCode}, phone=#{phone}, fax=#{fax}, email=#{email}, useable=#{useable}, primary_person=#{primaryPerson}, deputy_person=#{deputyPerson}, create_by=#{createBy.id}, create_date=#{createDate}, update_by=#{updateBy.id}, update_date=#{updateDate}, remarks=#{remarks}, del_flag=#{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_office SET del_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
